title: Trust Concept and Enhanced Clinical Learning Program in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental clinical assessment techniques and patient communication experience
context.additional_context: Hybrid education environment combining smartphone-based VR simulations with problem-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain three attitudinal elements (humility, empathy, transparency) for building patient trust
Learners can identify trust-building barriers from the patient's perspective and propose solutions through VR simulation
Learners can evaluate how establishing trust relationships with patients affects diagnostic accuracy in problem-based learning (PBL) scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
